p:
To reduce sampling bias towards a high number of samples from well-sampled countries, we removed duplicate sequences (same day and location) from Nicaragua and Peru, yielding a final dataset of 436 genomes (including 66 genomes collected in Brazil between 1990 to 2013). Maximum likelihood phylogenies of the American DENV2 genomes (n = 670 and n = 436) were generated using PhyML
20 available through Seaview v.4.6.1,using gamma-distributed among site rate heterogeneity and a general time reversible nucleotide substitution model.
21 Root-to-tip divergence and temporal signal was evaluated using TempEst
21 [ Supplementary data (Fig. 1)].
